website_summaries.verdict: A great product that is designed to remove weeds in flowerbeds and lawns.
pros: Steel head is plated with chrome
Sharp and effective at cutting out weeds
cons: Some say the tool is smaller and not as wide as they had expected

customer_reviews.title: Makes quick work of weeds and mystery growth.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a house that's part of an HOA.mThey take care of the lawn and landscaping. Because of the size of the complex, they never pull weeds. They chop them with the trimmer. Lame. So every time I open the garage door and walk to the mailbox I do a quick scan of the lawn. It's not that big. Any weeds or mystery plants get "The Treatment" using this hand weeder. I am absolutely winning the war against them thanks to this tool. It takes under 10 minutes a week. Now, the weeds tremble when Inopen the garage door and walk out. They are doomed!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: This is HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the weeder in the photo nor does it match the description. The handle is such a rough, unfinished wood that I am afraid I will get splinters just touching it. It is truly horrible and NOT the TruTemper weeder that is advertised, pictured or described. The label says SEYMOUR. It is certainly not worth the $20 being charged. Amazon has a Seymour weeder for $6. I ordered a TruTemper and expected TruTemper quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Laiuppa

customer_reviews.title: Eat My Weeds
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Lost one before we ordered this. Sturdy and feels good in your hand. Gets the weeks out - goes to the depth of the root. I also use it to open mole mounds so that I can get anti-mole products to the place they need to be without churning up the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Fenneman

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned, well made
customer_reviews.text: I use this for weeding, and it does exactly what it's supposed to do, freeing up the roots so you can pull the weed out with roots intact. Very well made with wood and chromed metal. Tip is shaped like a snake's tongue and sharp. This replaces my old one that I lost, and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Brand, Rough Appearance
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how well this tool will hold up over time, but I can tell you that the brand of the weeder sent to me was Seymour, which is not what I purchased. The metal seems thick enough, but this tool looks extremely poorly put together. The ring between the metal fork piece and the handle is simply glued on, not attached to the metal fork whatsoever. The glue is exposed and messy, the ring isn't even, and the hole where the metal fork piece sticks in the handle is too wide for the fork, so there's a visible gap. Going from looks alone, this won't last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job real well!
customer_reviews.text: Really does a super job of getting out dandelion relatives with long tap roots. Too bad it may have been discontinued. I had a couple others that handles dried out and eventually snapped in my high desert environment. Similar ones are not shown as durable as this one!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn F. Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t work for asparagus, but will for weeds
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when I bought this we thought it was for asparagus and it will not work for that. We have started using it for weeds and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Item received is not the same as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this weeder since it was similar to others that I used. The one received is not as pictured. Doesn't even say true temper. Has a different part number of 2447000.
customer_reviews.author: Odeo

customer_reviews.title: Great Weed Zapper
customer_reviews.text: This tool can be used for an assortment of gardening and other chores. It is strong, well made and the point is sharp and will cut weeds. It is also good for pulling back rocks out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest person

customer_reviews.title: Rip off — received inferior product.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive advertised item. I received a weeder made by Ames—not True Temper—that has a nice wood handle but the blade is black rough painted steel—not smooth chrome plated. The substituted item is clearly less expensive than the listed item.
customer_reviews.author: RDMii

customer_reviews.title: I am quite disappointed for the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that came to my mind when I got them, was that they were bigger than I expected. The second thing that I found out after using one the first time was that it bent. Therefore, I am quite disappointed for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: cecidf

customer_reviews.title: Vital garden hand tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool. Very sturdy. Withstands a lot of abuse without showing wear. I use it to dig everything not just weeds. Very durable..
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Essenntial Tool
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how you can garden without one. This design is more old fashioned but way more effective than other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOL!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these tools for years however it burned with everything else in a CA wildfire. While browsing garden tools on Amazon, i discovered this again and oredered it last month....it is still terrific and wonderful when hand weeding.
customer_reviews.author: P. GILMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool ! It's sharp and digs in deep. I've used it in my overgrown flower bed that had grass growing in it. Using just this one tool, I was able to dig deep and get the roots out. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit57

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and easy! I was skeptical. It works well and is nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for weeding. The forked end is sharp and makes it easy to cut the root below the surface. The handle is sturdy and the length is just right. :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan Elizabeth Smeltzer

customer_reviews.title: It penetrates our rocky, heavy clay and gets the roots way down
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for digging weeds with deep roots, and in between tight areas. It
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J Lott

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The weed cutter was not very sharp. I sharpened the end on a grinder and it worked much better
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Works great and made sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I had been unable to find this gardening tool in any stores and was happy to find it on Amazon. It's really sturdy and should last a long time even with the heavy use I give it.
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: Digs deep.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for weeding, goes deep enough to dig up pesky bluebell bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Full

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: A sought after tool for all gardener!!! This thing can remove dandelions and other weeds easily. The wooden handle is comfortable, and the metal part is extremely sharp to remove the root. I dug up so many dandelions in my lawns and love it so much. The price is decent, WAY CHEAPER than my local gardening and hardware stores. I want to get 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: Wei-nong Wang

customer_reviews.title: This would be even better if it didn't have that little bend down by ...
customer_reviews.text: Lately I've been unable to find weeders locally that don't have that silly bend in the shaft. When you're after dandelions, you want a straight weeder, so you can go straight down 12 in or so without cutting off the root. This would be even better if it didn't have that little bend down by the notch.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's the object or the operator. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's the object or the operator. Doesn't do the job well enough for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Got those annoying weeds that keep coming back cause the node is ...
customer_reviews.text: Got those annoying weeds that keep coming back cause the node is stuck down deep? This bad boy is perfect for driving to the source of the weed and getting it from the roots. I use this in my garden and love it for certain kinds of weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy garden tool.
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be a good sturdy garden weed puller with a comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Get those weeds!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found these replacements of our favorite weed digging and pulling tool. Nice wood handle.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect tool for weeding those types of weeds that have deep runners!
customer_reviews.author: lisa13.1

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Tool
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, well made tool Kind of old school, but it does a great job of getting out weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Brian02125

customer_reviews.title: head weeder
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful item to use when digging up weeds, thank you
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: no frills weeder
customer_reviews.text: solid wood handle will hopefully last as my last weeder had a plastic handle that broke in half. i only wish the angle at head was steeper to provide more torque in digging out thick dandelion roots. some fiskar models better designed but also pricier. this one does the job cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Laud

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but it could have been stronger as ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but it could have been stronger as mine bent quite quickly, using a normal force, but if you are a bit more dainty, with it, it wont bend. (I bought 2 pairs, my wife's did not bend, but mine did, as I guess I use a bit more force.)
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best I have used and it doesn't bend
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: very useful garden tool
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to use when removing weeds from your yard or garden.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: Handy tool for harvesting asparagus without digging up more than one spear.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy fm TN

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Makings getting out the pesky dandelions much easier. Bought two.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use old school tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Dandelions absolutely hate this thing ! Well constructed tool
customer_reviews.author: Treemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Study & effective
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Had one years ago & couldn’t find one in stores. Works great to up-root weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Jerre Gummelt

customer_reviews.title: A classic that works
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere in stores here for this classic weeder and couldn't find it. There are fancy expensive ones, but this old standard design has never failed me (except when I lose it!). This is solid, well made, and is that classic design that works so well for digging dandelions and other long-rooted weeds. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works well in clay. Does not bend. No excuses for wife :).
customer_reviews.author: PIRATE19

customer_reviews.title: Weeds No More!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't live without this weeder - makes digging up deep rooted weeds SO much easier. Good quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: booksandbelize

customer_reviews.title: Very big and long
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it four stars because I love the quality but it's too long.
customer_reviews.author: Carry

customer_reviews.title: This was a bit of a disappointment but it still does the trick
customer_reviews.text: This tool is not as long and the tip is not as wide as the old tried and true ones I have seen. This was a bit of a disappointment but it still does the trick. It is a well-made tool, just not as big as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it cuz it's hubby's job to dig the weeds!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Spider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent weeder. I do not like to use pesticides so I remove the weeds with this tool and it does a great job. It does not need much force, you just dig it in push up and there you go with the entire root.
customer_reviews.author: E T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy weed digger
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, works great. Handle is a little larger (circumference) than I would like. I have small hands. Love that the edge of the wooden handle is rounded so as not to cause pain to palm when digging.
customer_reviews.author: Eggalegga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Just insert into weed roots, twist and pull.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Naked

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I thought. Not sharp not as pictured. I researched this I wanted an asparagus cutter this is not an asparagus cutter at all to get weeds out this popped up.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love this weeder
customer_reviews.text: This tool is well-named, in my opinion, it IS the "Best Hand Weeder". Sturdy, comfortable in my hand, head has a sharp end cuts through soil easily. This tool has been a go-to tool for my spring clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR REMOVING DANDELIONS
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for removing Dandelions and other wretched weeds that plaque our lawn and gardens. I wish the handle was a little longer so you didn't need to stoop so low, but it really does the job. An alternative to chemical weed killers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: nice tool
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget does a good job removing dandelions if you don't mind being on your knees. It is very well made, has the solid feel of a tool you may have bought at the hardware store back in the "50's ". That's probably the best compliment I can give it.
customer_reviews.author: Olphart

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - took some time to find one with a wooden handle. Lost the one I had for 15 years -- maybe I'll find it buried in my garden one day.
customer_reviews.author: bananasforollie

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Me
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for just this very yard tool only with a longer handle. But, this item worked for me just fine. Price was right, it serves its purpose...I'm happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA K HAWKE

customer_reviews.title: No frills weed serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ropetrick

customer_reviews.title: Useless if you want to use it on dandelions
customer_reviews.text: Simple product. I do not care for the wooden handle much but this weeder is not sharp at all. Useless if you want to use it on dandelions. Overpriced. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rafal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool for All Kinds of Weeds
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS HAND WEEDER!!!! It takes the effort that can be so extreme sometimes out of weeding the ones that seem to be attached to other side of the world. GREAT TOOL! Light weight, easy to use - LOVE IT! Makes the chore so much easier to do and it gets done a whole lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: T Love

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, right price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. Much sturdier than others.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Eyed Moose

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the item as shown in the listing. Different handle. Not sharp. I suspected it was made in China and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Angus Nicholson III

customer_reviews.title: Good for digging up dandelions and other weeds with strong roots..
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard dandelion digger with a wooden handle made by a company with an excellent reputation. It was exactly what I was looking for when I ordered it. It does what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: ELinNM

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Weeder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kind of weeder. I haven't used it much since I got it so don't know about it's durability, but it looks pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy weeder should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: The last weeder I had came with a cushiony handle that failed after about a year of use. While this handle isn't soft it will last a long time and the metal part is sturdy and hasn't bent under a considerable amount of use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Handle finish coloration.
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing about the weeder except the finish on the handle which has an orange cast and isn't the nice brown coloration shown in the offering illustration. I would like to exchange one for the other. Thanks, Leftwich D. Kimbrough
customer_reviews.author: Leftwich D. Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made, simple, classic tool that works.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure my daughter will make good use of it
customer_reviews.text: a gift for christmas, I'm sure my daughter will make good use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hayek

customer_reviews.title: What a Simplistically Wonderful Tool
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review purchases, so when I do it's something that I feel strongly about. This is a wonderful tool for "getting to the root" of things. Having the right tools makes gardening so much more enjoyable - and effective.
customer_reviews.author: MNWildRose

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am new to weeding. This weeder made it very easy to dig out deep roots. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Weeds be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Needed another one of these for simultaneous gardening. Works well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wong

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good quality tool!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tool and can’t garden without it! It’s very durable and strong, just what I need for digging out weeds in our clay soil.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Asparagus
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised on the Amazon site as an asparagus knife, but that's baloney. It is not sharp enough to cut asparagus. Should work OK as a weeder.
customer_reviews.author: ETexGuy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's strong enought to pry out stubborn roots and sharp enought to get through root bound areas.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great Weed Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, well-designed for removing weeds! It makes the task so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I really like this to help pull weeds
customer_reviews.text: Had one and somehow it went missing, I really like this to help pull weeds.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY LEE DOWLING

customer_reviews.title: my trusty weeding companion
customer_reviews.text: I like solid wood handle. Feels like a tool I'll have the rest of my life.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tool has limited use but it is adequate for killing one weed at a time.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well picking out stubborn weeds. Very well made doesn't bend. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product just like the one I used when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: pj1460

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for picking asparagus, found out I am supposed to cut below the soil when picking so they grow back double. Looks like ti can be easily sharpened in the future.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nathe

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to own
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have for those weeds that don't pull up easy with your hands!! I take this too my urban garden plot daily!

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Tru Temper Best Hand Weeder, the Best Hand Trowel and the Best Cultivator. Real wood handles. Remarkably good value.

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool that makes yard work easier
customer_reviews.text: Dandelion destroyer. This handy little tool grabs the root and yanks them out. Great little tool that makes yard work easier.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made hand tool w/sturdy handle.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. I use these to get to the roots of nuisance growth near ornamental trees.

customer_reviews.title: Weeder
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a plastic handle weeder and received a wooden handle. Very disappointing

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Good For Pulling Weeds. My Boyfriend Uses It All The Time. I Use It All The Time Too! You Should Not Have Us Write So Many Words. If We Give It 5 Stars That Should Be Enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Randol

customer_reviews.title: It just works. Solid, old school weed remover that your greatgrandparents had.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. A weed remover. No bells. No whistles. No weeds.Easy to sharpen. A little sanding, fresh coat of poly every other year and it will last.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a weeder from our local hardware store and it broke in 3 weeks. I returned that one and purchased this one and I'm really, really happy with it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best for getting rid of tough Johnson grass and weeds. Pops them right up. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. bought one at Walmart and it broke after ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. bought one at Walmart and it broke after a couple of uses. This one seems to be doing better.
customer_reviews.author: Jenee Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It is the best
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats this tool at digging out weeds without disturbing nearby plants. A comfortable wooden handle, the right length (12"), sharp, and rust resistant.
customer_reviews.author: a.c.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Sold tool, you feel it was made with quality in mind. It is sharp and cuts weeds easily The length also apporiate.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee User

customer_reviews.title: This hand weeder is as good (maybe slightly better
customer_reviews.text: My garden for a hand weeder that doesn't bend! This hand weeder is as good (maybe slightly better?) as the one at home depot, and it's nice to not have to make a trip and just get them on amazon, but oh how I wish I could buy one of these and not have it bend itself into uselessness in a couple months. I'll admit, the wood handle is pretty sweet. Way better than a squishy one that kills your pushing leverage. Maybe I'm just too rough, strong and manly for these things?
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Cole

customer_reviews.title: The "vee" notch of my tool was dull and rough
customer_reviews.text: The "vee" notch of my tool was dull and rough. It just had the raw edge from the stamping press; rolled edges and burrs weren't removed, they just chrome plated over them. Is a sharp tool too much to expect for 10 bucks today? I filed it myself to get a proper edge.
customer_reviews.author: Lima484

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived much nicer than I expected. Area between prongs is sharp enough to cut roots.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Does what I got it to do
customer_reviews.text: No longer have my own garden but help out at the local playground. Works great and easy to carry back and forth.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. We don't use chemicals on our yard and this makes pulling up the weeds much easier.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this tool. It is well made, sturdy, and I think it will last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket1206

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and gets down to the root and lifts it ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it almost everyday. Very sturdy and gets down to the root and lifts it out.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more substantial
customer_reviews.text: Great tool so far, just worried that it might break where the wood attaches to the steel. So far, so good, though.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast shipping of quality weeder
customer_reviews.text: Super fast regular shipping- I ordered on Thursday & package arrived on SUNDAY! The hand weeder is sturdy & a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, but I wish it were 3 or 4 inches longer for deep rooted weeds.

product_meta.title: True Temper 1983800 Best Hand Weeder
product_meta.description:
Ames True Temper Hand Weeder With Wood Handle Use to remove weeds in flowerbeds and lawns. Traditional wood handle design includes a poly over molded grip for added comfort. The chrome-plated head makes weeding easier. Smooth northern ash handle. Chrome-plated steel head riveted for added strength. Drop shank design. Convenient hang-up hole.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Best Wooden Handle Weeder
feature_bullets: Ames True Temper Hand Weeder With Wood Handle Use to remove weeds in flowerbeds and lawns
Traditional wood handle design includes a poly over molded grip for added comfort
The chrome-plated head makes weeding easier
Chrome-plated steel head with rivets for extra strength.
Smooth northern ash handle for comfort and control.
Returns will not be honored on this Closeout item

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars278 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
